char_info.char_desc: The Oni Happy With Long Hair

t_scene_info.speaker: Suika:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Should oni also be having this hair? I should thank the one responsible.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: While I enjoy the hair that I've had before the Federal Kingdom of Gensokyo was established,

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Reimu refuses to be a Little Hair Queen.

t_scene_info.speaker: Suika:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Little Hair Queen? Who is one then, Empress Kaguya or Queen Yukari?

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I too am one. Every kingdom that has a female ruler is one!

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: If I think you're amused and happy about this, don't wait too long.

t_scene_info.speaker: Suika:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Are you going to go after the person who kickstarted it? Only if you defeat my spell card!
